name: Rush (itch) (Minisoop)
description:
I first started on this around 3 years ago! Having gone through uni, I decided to apply some finishing touches and publish this game.

In Rush, the player must race against time in a series of levels filled with obstacles in order to evade the 'chaser' and earn the best medals possible.

The levels get harder as you progress through the game! The Chaser moves considerably faster and the obstacles are more difficult to avoid, and cause greater impact when collided with. #arcade

Play in browser, or download for yourself.

P.S. To unlock the bonus level: travel backwards in level four.
